trait.name: Terror Frenzy (Fury Only)
text: The spirit has advantage on attack rolls against frightened creatures.

trait.name: Weight of Sorrow (Despair Only)
text: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that creature's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Chilling Rend
text: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d12 + 3 + the spell's level cold damage.

action.name: Dreadful Scream (1/Day)
text: The spirit screams. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be frightened for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
